name: Unboxing
description: The OPUS reader, a USB Mini-B cable, and a French instruction card were included in the packaging

name: Reader and Cable
description: The OPUS card reader with the USB cable

name: OPUS card in the reader
description: The OPUS card easily inserts itself into the front of the reader

name: Reader connect to the computer
description: The reader connects to any USB port on your computer

name: Card reader working
description: Two lights on the reader indicate its status with a power light and activity indicator

name: No hassle detection
description: The reader is properly recognized by the computer without any manual intervention

name: Chrome Unsupported
description: The latest version of Google Chrome does not support Java, making the browser incompatible

name: Java step one
description: You first need to allow Java to run in the broswer

name: Java step two
description: Next you must allow Java on the page

name: Java step three
description: Finally you must authorize the execution of the Java applet

name: Reading the card
description: The contents of the card are read quickly

name: Card contents
description: The contents of my card are displayed with last month\\'s buss pass and two train tickets

name: Checkout
description: You can review your purchase before proceeding to payment

name: Payment
description: Payment requires just a few bits of information

name: Verifying the credit card
description: The purchase is charged to the credit card

name: Recharging the card
description: The purchased fare is loaded onto the card

name: Purchase confirmation
description: Confirmation of the transaction is displayed with the newly loaded fare indicated

name: Receipt
description: An electronic copy of the receipt is provided
